1193490.name: A Crooked Heart
1193490.description: A Crooked Heart has been placed on hold until further notice.  Which, when I look at it realistically, is probably an indefinite hold that will never be released.  It took me a year to come to this terribly difficult decision.  The small amount of funding I had dried up, and without the ability to afford key personnel, it became impossible to continue.  I've failed myself and the ones that were looking forward to the final release.  I'm sorry that it's probably never going to happen.
1193490.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
